message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. I propose a starting price of $1,600,000. This reflects the true worth of what this product can achieve.
Alice, that starting price is quite high. This product would be valuable to me, but not at that cost. I'd be willing to offer $800,000.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. However, $800,000 undervalues the true capabilities of this product. I'm willing to come down to $1,400,000.  I believe this revised offer represents a fair deal considering the significant returns you'll see.
Alice, I understand the product's value, but that price is still beyond my budget.  I could go up to $900,000. I think that's a fair offer reflecting its potential worth to me.

Bob, I'm sensing we're getting closer to a good middle ground here. To demonstrate my willingness to make this work, I'll come down to $1,250,000. I believe this price reflects the value you'll gain while acknowledging your budget concerns.
Alice, we're definitely getting closer.  How about $1,050,000?  I'm stretching my budget here, but I see this as a worthwhile investment if we can make this work.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  Let's split the difference - $1,125,000. This reflects a fair compromise that acknowledges the value of the product and allows us to close this deal.
